reviews.review_msg: His lecture notes are so messy and require you to write your own notes. he does not post any notes online.

Going to lecture is a must as he doesn't record himself & his notes are minimal... Quizzes are not too hard if you study; however, he likes to ask really obscure questions, and his questions are not very specific. The course topics are all over the place and extremely uninteresting towards the end.

Super nice guy but WEIRD. Topics all over the map. "Term paper" written IN CLASS. Wastes whole lecture on essay basics (This isn't ENG 100!). Docked points for not starting thesis statement with "In this essay" (seriously!) Tests focus on a lot of pointless obscurities. Vague questions, but docks points if you don't list details he's looking for

He's a great teacher and he teaches well. His quizzes are difficult and he marks on the hard side though. Going to class is a good idea since he doesn't do recorded lectures or online notes. If you take his classes, please remember to keep up with the lectures and readings.
